content.raw:
Took some time to looking at the code changes and they look harmless \(and correct\). 

Running setup.py also runs as expected.

I'll try to deploy these changes on my test machine on Wednesday. But I see no reason to suspect that something will break.

I did a quick read of the documentation itself and everything seamed well explained.

‌
